creditAnalysis.title: Credit Analysis
creditAnalysis.subtitle: Chat with our AI assistant to analyze your credit profile.

chat.emptyState: Start a conversation to analyze your credit
chat.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.

responses.greeting: Hello! I'm your credit analysis assistant. I can help you review your credit history, analyze credit reports, and give you recommendations to improve your score. You can send me files like PDF credit reports or record voice messages. How can I help you today?
responses.analyzing: Thank you for the information. I'm analyzing your credit profile. Based on what you're sharing, I recommend reviewing your recurring payments and making sure to keep your credit utilization below 30%. Would you like me to go deeper into any specific aspect?
responses.recommendation: Based on my analysis, here are some key recommendations: 1) Keeping payments on time is fundamental for your score. 2) Avoid opening many new accounts in a short period. 3) Review your credit report regularly to detect errors. Do you need help with anything else?
responses.fileReceived: I've received your file. I'm reviewing the document to extract the relevant credit information. Give me a moment to analyze it and I'll provide you with a detailed summary and personalized recommendations.
responses.audioReceived: I've received your voice message. Let me process what you mentioned and prepare a detailed response about your credit situation.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: A production-ready SaaS boilerplate built with modern technologies.

nextjs.title: Next.js 15
nextjs.description: Built on the latest Next.js with App Router, Server Components, and Server Actions for optimal performance.

auth.title: Supabase Auth
auth.description: Built-in authentication with email/password, social logins, and Row Level Security integration.

supabase.title: Supabase Database
supabase.description: PostgreSQL database with Row Level Security, real-time subscriptions, and type-safe queries.

stripe.title: Stripe Payments
stripe.description: Subscription billing with Stripe Checkout, Customer Portal, and webhook integration.
